name: Melly
description:
There is so much more to me than what I can write in this little box. In a nutshell, if you are looking for a tall, beautiful, genuine, kind, fun loving, warm, elegant, animal lover, refined, romantic and extremely passionate, successful lady, you should message let find out what we have in common and see how it goes from there.
Looking for someone who is kind, caring and compassionate, romantic and fun. A man who is comfortable expressing his emotions, hopes, dreams and also desires. Relationship require effort by each partner. Good communication is vital to me and the willingness to make certain compromises to better the relationship. he must not be perfect but just be perfect for me. I’m ready to find love again.
